This easy-to-find restaurant serves great pintxos, but also is happy to seat guests for an excellent early (for Spain) dinner.  The food, service and wine list cannot be beat, and the prices are reasonable.  We went there twice the week we were in Barcelona, and once more two weeks later on our way to the airport.  The waiters are very happy to explain each dish, and are understandably proud of them.  Everything we tried was superb.  If I lived in Barcelona I would eat at Irati every week, plus a night or two of pintxos there.  Its that good.
